I wrote a couple of functions that you may find useful in your data analysis

- `to_dummies` convert 
- `from_dummies` 

You need to install the **pols503** package to
```{r eval=FALSE}
library("devtools")
install_github("POLS503/r-pols503")
```
And load it
```{r}
library("pols503")
```
